Articles.Content:
Anyone hyped up for comet ISON this year? what do you think will happen? Will it fizzle out? Be ripped apart? Be the most spectacular thing we have ever seen? Is it the biblical Wormwood?

I personally can't wait to see what happens. Hopefully it will swing around the sun and make for one heck of a show for us on Earth. and being the non believer that i am, i doubt it is wormwood or anything else biblical...

Oh, i am waiting for this comet. Unfortunately every look at the window and overcast sky threatening rain at any moment gives me a reality check. I live in not particularly astronomy-friendly area of the world. So i'm trying to contain my enthusiasm so i don't get burned later.
I never get excited about comets anymore until we see how they perform.
